name: hungryturtlecode
description: This is the site that is available at [https://hungryturtlecode.com](https://hungryturtlecode.com)

scripts.start: export JEKYLL_ENV=development && concurrently 'NODE_ENV=development webpack -w' 'bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --drafts' 'npm start --prefix api/'
scripts.noreload: export JEKYLL_ENV=development && concurrently 'webpack -w' 'bundle exec jekyll serve --drafts' 'npm start --prefix api/'
scripts.build: rm -r _site && export JEKYLL_ENV=production && NODE_ENV=production webpack && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.prod.yml
scripts.deploy: rm -r _site && export JEKYLL_ENV=production && NODE_ENV=production webpack && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.prod.yml && firebase deploy

author: Adrian Henry
